translations: [环境]污染物；污垢物（contaminant 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Filters do not remove all contaminants from water.
sentences.translation: 过滤器无法过滤掉水中的所有污染物。

sentences.sentence: Contaminants found in poultry will also be found in their eggs.
sentences.translation: 在家禽里发现的污染物，也将会在它们下的蛋里发现。

sentences.sentence: Fossils are often washed together on-site in a large bath which can allow water and contaminants in the form of contemporary DNA to permeate into the porous bones.
sentences.translation: 化石通常在大浴池中进行现场清洗，这可以使水和现代 DNA 形式的污染物渗透到多孔骨骼中。
